channel.title: Apache County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Apache County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-160 West/US-191 South at US-191 South
item.description: US-160 West/US-191 South at US-191 South in rural Apache County.

item.title: US-160 West/US-191 South Approaching US-191 South
item.description: US-160 West/US-191 South approaching US-191 south to I-40 and Ganado. The US-191 and US-160 shields are in the background of the photo.

item.title: US-160 West/US-191 South Approaching US-191 South
item.description: US-160 West/US-191 South approaching US-191 South to Chile, and Canyon De Chelly (National Monument). Continue west on US-160 for Kayenta.

item.title: US-160 West/US-191 South Approaching US-191 South
item.description: US-160 West/US-191 South approaching US-191 South.

item.title: End US-64 West at US-160
item.description: End US-64 west at US-160 in Teec Nos Pos. Turn right for US-160 east; continue ahead for US-160 west.

item.title: End US-64 West Approaching US-160
item.description: End US-6A4 west approaching US-160. Turn right for US-160 east to Cortez (Colorado) and Four Corners National Monument. Continue ahead for US-160 east to Kayenta.

item.title: US-64 West - Teec Nos Pos
item.description: Entering Teec Nos Pos on US-64 west. This is the first community in Arizona on US-64 west, and also the closest community to Four Corners.

item.title: US-64 West Approaching US-160
item.description: US-64 West approaching US-160. This is the western end of US-64. The eastern end of US-64 is in Nags Head, North Carolina.

item.title: AZ-61 West at US-60
item.description: AZ-61 west at US-60. Turn left for US-60 east; continue ahead for US-60 west.

item.title: AZ-61 West Approaching US-60
item.description: AZ-61 west approaching US-60.

item.title: End AZ-180A East at AZ-61
item.description: End AZ-180A East at AZ-61. Use AZ-61 west for Show Low; use AZ-61 east for St. Johns.

item.title: AZ-180A West - Winter Driving Warning
item.description: Warning on AZ-180A that the highway is not plowed nights or on weekends during storms.

item.title: AZ-61 West At AZ-180A West
item.description: AZ-61 west at AZ-180A west. Use AZ-180A for Holbrook and Petrified Forest. Continue west on AZ-61 for Show Low.

item.title: AZ-61 West Approaching AZ-180A
item.description: AZ-61 west approaching AZ-180A.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at Split
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at US-180/AZ-61 split. Turn right for US-180 West; continue straight for AZ-61 West.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at Split
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at US-180/AZ-61 split. Turn right for US-180 west to Holbrook and Petrified Forest (National Park). Continue straight on AZ-61 west for Show Low.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West Approaching AZ-61
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West approaching US-180/AZ-61 split.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West in St. Johns.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180
item.description: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180. Turn left for US-180 East/US-181 South to Springerville.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180
item.description: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180. AZ-61 is not signed at this intersection. Turn left for US-191 South/US-180 East. Continue straight for US-180 West/AZ-61 West.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West - Entering St. Johns
item.description: Entering St. Johns on US-191 South/AZ-61 West. Elevation 5725 Feet. Founded in 1874. St. Johns is the county seat of Apache County.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West Approaching US-180
item.description: US-191 South/AZ-61 West approaching US-180.

item.title: AZ-61 West at US-191
item.description: AZ-61 west at US-191. AZ-61 west joins US-191 south to St. Johns. Use US-191 South/AZ-61 West for St. Johns. Use US-191 North for Sanders.

item.title: AZ-61 West Approaching US-191
item.description: AZ-61 west approaching US-191. AZ-61 west joins US-191 south to St. Johns.

item.title: AZ-61 West Approaching Navajo-2025
item.description: AZ-61 west approaching Navajo-2025.

item.title: I-40 East - New Mexico State Line
item.description: New Mexico State Line on I-40 east.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 359
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 359 - Grants Road. This is the last Arizona exit on I-40 eastbound.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 359
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 359. Use Exit 359 for Historic US-66.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 357
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 357 - Navajo IR-12 North/Window Rock. Window Rock is the capitol of the Navajo Nation.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 354
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 354 - Hawthorne Road.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 351
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 351 - Allentown Road.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 348
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 348 - Houck.

item.title: I-40 Onramp at Exit 346
item.description: I-40 onramp at Exit 346. Use I-40 west for Flagstaff; use I-40 east for Albuquerque.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 346
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 346 - Pine Springs Road.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 343
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 343 - Querino Road.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 341
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 341 - Ortega Road.

item.title: I-40 East - Entering Navajo Nation
item.description: Entering the Navajo Nation on I-40 east.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 339
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 339 - US-191 South/St. Johns. US-191 south leaves I-40 eastbound at Exit 339.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 333
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 333 - US-191 North/Ganado. US-191 south joins I-40 eastbound for six miles.

item.title: I-40 East/US-191 South
item.description: I-40 East/US-191 south in Apache County, Arizona. The US-191 shield is actually in error, because US-191 does not join I-40 eastbound for another 3 miles.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 320
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 320 - McCarrell Road.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 325
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 325 - Navajo.

item.title: I-40 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-40 east to Jct. US-191 North, Jct. US-191 South, and Albuquerque.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 320
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 320 - Pinta Road.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 311
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 311 - Petrified Forest National Park.

item.title: US-160 West at US-64
item.description: US-160 west at US-64 east to Shiprock. Use US-160 west for Kayenta.

item.title: US-160 West at US-64
item.description: US-160 west approaching US-64 junction.

item.title: US-160 West Approaching US-64
item.description: US-160 west approaching US-64.

item.title: US-160 East at US-64
item.description: US-160 east at US-64 east. US-64 east begins here.

item.title: US-160 East at US-64
item.description: US-160 east approaching US-64 east to Shiprock (NM). Use US-160 east for Cortez (CO) and Four Corners.

item.title: US-160 East Approaching US-64
item.description: US-160 east approaching US-64.

item.title: US-160 East - Arizona Port of Entry
item.description: East US-160 approaching the Arizona Port of Entry.

item.title: US-160 East - Teec Nos Pos
item.description: East US-160 entering Teec Nos Pos

item.title: US-160 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-160 east to Teec Nos Pos and Four Corners.

item.title: US-160 East at BIA-35
item.description: US-160 east at BIA-35. Sweetwater is 14 miles to the south on BIA-35.

item.title: US-160 East at BIA-35
item.description: US-160 east approaching BIA-35 north to Montezuma Creek. Continue on US-160 east to Four Corners.

item.title: US-160 East at BIA-12/To US-191
item.description: US-160 east at BIA-12 North to US-191. All maps denote this as US-191, but the sign says BIA-12.

item.title: US-160 East at BIA-12 North (US-191)
item.description: US-160 east approaching BIA-12 North to US-191 and Bluff (Utah).

item.title: US-160 East Approaching BIA-12/To US-191 North
item.description: US-160 east approaching BIA-12 North to US-191.

item.title: US-160 East/US-191 North
item.description: US-160 East/US-191 North

item.title: US-160 East at US-191 South
item.description: US-160 east at US-191 south to Ganado and Chinle. US-191 joins US-160 east next 3 miles.

item.title: US-160 East Approaching US-191
item.description: US-160 east approaching US-191.

item.title: US-64 West at US-160
item.description: US-160 west at US-64 junction in Teec Nos Pos.
